tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Whalers Throw Flashbangs
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: When the Sea Shepherds approach a whaler the crew starts throwing flashbangs!

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview:
and you base this on completely nothing but your bare emotions.
I﻿ think we know who the stupid one is.
thats why﻿ i was confuzed when he said good english you because that's not really proper either.

each people must thank this people who put theirselves in danger to save the wales from extiction, we must give them our full support and also some of our cash :) for me am , i think going to school and educating my classmates about wale extiction etc. is the greatest﻿ contribution i can give for now :)
If you ever see a live whaile you will know who is in﻿ the wrong!!!!
throw﻿ a motherfucking bomb on it >:(
you﻿ sir, are a fucking moron

implying that they are hunters and not researchers?
Why is it always one end of the extreme to the other with you guys? How about doing fatal research on just enough whales﻿ to not cause a extinction? They are doing the research on Minke whales anyway, those shits are on the least concerened list.
so youre proud﻿ of being stupid, doesnt surprise me alfter all "Stupidity insists always"
are﻿ the ones in the small boats bad

The IWC has no way to enforce their policies. That's﻿ why japan continually ignores their ban. They have nothing to fear, except from the Sea Shepherds, since no Nation will send their Navy to protect the southern ocean. It is a lawless area of the sea, and the good guys are outnumbered by the bad. I'd like to see the good guys show up with torpedos.

nah I rather show my kids the non-extinct creature called the Cat.
U act like whales are gonna become extinct 2 seconds from now and that it's such﻿ a bad thing cuz ur dumb kids wont be able to see some giant fish.
What about the dinosaurs? They went extinct i don't see u crying about them.
Sorry,﻿ I was on my phone and couden't reply to the actual comment
You do realise that an entire ecosystem will collapes if﻿ wales go die out
Killing whales isnt terrorism?﻿ Lol... Id rather piss of the whalers...
so you suggest they let the whalers hunt the whales to﻿ extinction ?
Interesting. As much as I might agree Whales and other﻿ such animals should be protected. What the Sea Shepherds are doing is terrorism.

Wouldn't the﻿ IWC done something by now if they haven't given permission for the Japanese to conduct research in southern oceans?
Also how can u be sure that 99% is food? You know Japan are also importing from iceland right (and vice versa)?

LOL
U mad?﻿

Oh gee i don't know why don't we find out by letting the whales die out? Im all for it.
At least your honest in admitting that u only care for﻿ things you saw and liked unlike the others i've spoke to who just bullshits their way through.

Here's a thought. Everyone that is for Japan's illegal whaling, you're gonna get your throats slit and gonna hang your asses. You're a bunch of ignorant fucks who know nothing about law. Quit supporting the Japanese just because they're law breakers and to piss off everyone else.﻿ You're not fucking cool. You're just making yourself look like a fucking illiterate, moronic, dumb fuck.
ohhh he﻿ said u mad? what a pro troll..
whales are﻿ mammals not fish
because dinosaurs NEVER existed in our time, dumb ass. They are an﻿ important part of the ecosystem. if whales go, what's next after that?
I didnt see no flash﻿ and certainly no bang!
and you base this on absolutely nothing. ﻿
